exercise_description: Press the barbell upward from your chest while lying flat on a bench.
Lower and raise your body by bending and extending your arms while keeping your core tight.
Press dumbbells overhead while seated or standing to engage shoulders and triceps.
Lower your hips back and down while keeping your chest upright, then stand back up.
Lift a loaded barbell from the ground by extending your hips and knees.
Hold a straight-body position with weight supported by forearms and toes.
Curl the dumbbells upward by bending your elbows while keeping your upper arms still.
Step forward and lower your body until both knees are at 90 degrees, then push back up.
Pull the bar down toward your chest to engage the lats and upper back.
Lift your torso from a lying position to engage your abdominal muscles.
Lower your body by bending your elbows behind you, then push back up to work the triceps.
Push the weighted platform away from you using your legs while seated.
Twist your torso side to side while seated to activate the oblique muscles.
Pull a barbell toward your torso while hinging at the hips to target the back.
Raise your heels off the ground and lower them slowly to strengthen your calves.
